name: Raden Adjeng Kartini
description: Indonesian women's rights pioneer who advocated for women's education and emancipation in colonial Indonesia
philosophy: A woman has the right to education, to development of her mind, to work, and to independence.
quotes: I would be a free woman, to stand on my own feet, not to depend on anyone
Oh, it is not the right of the strongest that we should want, but the right of justice
